text: Lava fountains on 13 September 2014 at the fissure's main crater named Baugur. Baugur is the informal name of one of three volcanic craters which have appeared as of 7 September 2014 - according to the Icelandic Meteorological Office website - in the Holuhraun lava field in Iceland as a result of an eruption in August 2014.http://en.vedur.is/earthquakes-and- volcanism/articles/nr/3001 == References == Category:Fissure vents Category:Volcanoes of Iceland Category:Active volcanoes
title: Baugur (crater)
